roleset.name: not able to be dislodged
roleset.note: UNDISLODGEABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-2,3. Relation to 'dislodge.01'. (from undislodgeable.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: One thing they found particularly hard to deal with was other young men attaching themselves to their group and being undislodgeable -LRB- a nwe word and it 's only 9 am ! -RRB- .
